transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Haan ji.
Customer: Hello. H.T.M. Health Care se baat ho rahi hai sir?
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji.
Customer: Sir, main Priyanka baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se senior manager. Sir aapne na kal ek feedback diya hai IndiaMART ko not satisfied ka. Aap bataye.
Customer: Madam, main aapko kai baar feedback de chuka hu. Main baar baar feedback nahi de sakta mam har roz negative feedback hai.
Executive: Sir, feedback jo negative feedback kal diya hai sir, main usi ke liye maine aapko call kiya sir. Kya reason raha hai ki aapne negative feedback diya hai?
Customer: Ab main negative feedback pehle hi teen char baar de chuka hu main aapko. To koi action thodi hota hai. Aap leke negative feedback apne paas rakh lete hain baat khatam ho jati hai.
Executive: Sir, main aapki help karne ke liye, bilkul action lene ke liye sir maine phone kiya hai ki aapne jo not satisfied diya hai, iske pichhe kya baat hui hai?
Customer: Suno, ek minute sun lo phir meri baat. Ek to fake inquiry aati hai aapke saare IndiaMART pe. Theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Aur jo mere paas jo inquiries aati hai saari retail ki aati hai. Ek strip, do strip, teen strip. Maine isliye IndiaMART join nahi kiya tha ki main ek ek do do strip courier karaunga ya unke liye char baar phone karunga. Maine IndiaMART isliye kiya tha ki franchise base pe ya kuch aur achcha business 5-10 box ka order rahe uske liye. Ek ek strips ke liye wo usse bhi phone karta hu to kehta hai hume to mil gayi ji. Ek strip chahiye. Ab main Hisar se apna business karta hu. Koi Maharashtra mein kehta hai mujhe ek strip courier kara do sir. To wo possible nahi hoga na?
Hmm.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To saari fake inquiries aati hai mam. Maine only PCD ke liye third party ke liye isko join kiya tha. Lekin saari hi only retail based inquiry aati hai mere paas.
Executive: Achcha. Aur wo bhi fake hoti hai. Message aapko lead aati hai lead ka message aata hai ki 200 box itraconazole ya 20 bottle sodium alginate. Jab usko lead ko hum consume karte hain to single bottle customer ki requirement hoti hai. Uspe likha aata hai. Lead aati hai message aata hai lead ka ki 200 bottle ki requirement hai. Jab leads ko buy lead karte hain to ek bottle ka usko phir message aata hai ki ek bottle ke liye humne use karega.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Saari fake inquiries hai aapki mam.
Executive: Okay. Sir aapka kya rehta hai minimum order quantity jo rehta hai dealing karne ke liye wo kya rehta hai aapke sir?
Customer: Main 5 se 10 box to ho minimum. Ek ek bottles ki ya ek ek strips ko hum sorry sale kare. Retail ka kaam thodi kar rahe hain hum online.
Hmm.
Executive: Hmm. Okay.
Customer: Hum retail ka kaam ke liye to main juda bhi nahi tha. Mujhe pata hota to main aapke sath judunga bhi nahi aur next time ke liye bhi kabhi main aapke sath add nahi karaunga.
Executive: Okay. Minimum 500 box ka requirement hai.
Customer: Mere ko 33,000 dene ke baad mere ko 330 ka bhi business nahi mila aapke yaha se.
Executive: ₹33,000 pay kiya hai aapne?
Customer: 33 shayad 28 plus GST tha kuch aisa.
Executive: Okay. Haan 28000 plus GST aapne pay kiya hai. Theek hai. To sir kitna aapko.
Customer: Haan to mujhe 330 ka business 330 ka business bhi mujhe consume nahi hua yaha se aap se mujhe kya fayda hai?
Executive: Okay, okay, theek hai. Aap se main baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Theek hai humne aap please ab main kaam kar raha hu mam. Mam main kaam kar raha hu aap mujhe 4-5 baje phone kar lena. Baki aap phir kare aapne mere se baat.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Received fake and retail-based inquiries.

- Minimum order quantity is not being met.

- Did not get any business after paying ₹33,000.



Resolution:

- Executive called to understand the negative feedback.

- Executive listened to the customer's concerns.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer back at 4-5 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- fake inquiries, retail, minimum order, feedback

seller_categories.mcat_name: Sodium Alginate,Sodium Bicarbonate and Calcium Oral Suspension
Tranexamic Acid And Mefenamic Acid Tablet
